messages.action.no_speakers_error: :robot: :weary: No bots are available to play in <#{voice_channel_id}>, try again when one is
messages.response.not_in_voice_channel_error: :robot: :weary: You're not in a voice channel
messages.response.queued_no_speakers: :robot: :see_no_evil: Queued [{song_title}](<{song_url}>). No bots are available right now, join a different channel or use `/play` when one is to start playing here.
messages.response.queued_multiple_no_speakers: :robot: :see_no_evil: Queued {count} songs. No bots are available right now, join a different channel or use `/play` when one is to start playing here.
messages.response.skip_more_votes_needed.singular: :robot: :fast_forward: 1 more `/skip` vote is needed to skip [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.skip_more_votes_needed.plural: :robot: :fast_forward: {count} more `/skip` votes are needed to skip [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.skip_already_voted_error: :robot: :triumph: You've already voted to skip this song [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.stopped: :robot: :relieved: Skipped [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) and stopped playing in <#{voice_channel_id}> (added by <@{user_id}>)
messages.response.stop_more_votes_needed.singular: :robot: :stop_button: 1 more `/stop` vote is needed to stop playing in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.stop_more_votes_needed.plural: :robot: :stop_button: {count} more `/stop` votes are needed to stop playing in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.stop_already_voted_error: :robot: :triumph: You've already voted to stop playing in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.nothing_is_queued_error: :robot: :weary: Nothing is queued to play in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.already_playing_error: :robot: :weary: A song is already playing in <#{voice_channel_id}>
